item.title: Please, help me choose my new glasses!
item.dc:creator: Xavier Damman
item.content:encoded:
Since I've lost my glasses in Toronto last week, I have to buy new ones. But I really can't decide. It's so difficult to choose. Moreover I'm colorblind which really doesn't help. So, I will be very grateful to you if you could help me choose between my different possibilities. To do so, just go on http://www.helpmechoosebetween.com

Technorati Tags: geek, hype, web2.0
